memory.project_context: Marketing Websites Monorepo - Multi-tenant SaaS platform with Next.js 16, React 19, TypeScript, Supabase, and feature-sliced design architecture

key_patterns.architecture: Feature-Sliced Design (FSD) v2.1 with app → pages → widgets → features → entities → shared layers
key_patterns.tech_stack: Next.js 16.1.5, React 19.0.0, TypeScript 5.9.3, Tailwind CSS v4, Turborepo 2.8.10, pnpm 10.29.2
key_patterns.database: Supabase (PostgreSQL + Realtime) with Row Level Security for multi-tenant isolation
key_patterns.deployment: Vercel with edge functions and ISR patterns

development_rules: Follow FSD layer isolation with unidirectional dependencies
Use Server Components by default, Client Components only when needed
All database access through repository pattern with tenant isolation
Use Tailwind CSS only, no inline styles
Implement comprehensive error handling and logging
security_requirements: Row Level Security (RLS) for all database operations
Required tenantId parameters in all repository methods
Comprehensive audit logging with correlation IDs
testing_standards: E2E tests with Playwright for critical user flows
